attributes.title: My wife and kids left me after I got this app
attributes.review: After my big rally I decided to download the app then my phone started on fire and burned down our house and my wife’s Valentino white bag my wife left me and took the children with her.

attributes.title: MUST BE TERMINATED
attributes.review: This app must be deleted immediately. First of all, the app took 420 hours and 69 minutes to download, and then my phone got a virus on it. The app wouldn’t stop spamming my phone with pictures of dog nipples. I highly do not recommend downloading for any reason.

attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review: All I wanted to do was support Trump through this app. Instead this app was actually a democratic ploy full of fake news. It tried to take all my information and I deleted it immediately! Down with this app!!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: App took far to long to download, over an hour. After it finally downloaded it kept crashing. When the app does “work” it’s full of bugs and glitches. It’s a terrible app!

attributes.title: Hacked my phone
attributes.review: This app took half of the storage on my phone up. It took three weeks to download. When it finally downloaded my phone detected a virus and all my private information was leaked. Do not download this app.

attributes.title: #TRUMP2020
attributes.review: Very good app over all downloaded in 5 minutes!

attributes.title: Horrible!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this about a week ago and it just recently finished 2 days ago!! The sign in took forever to do and was extremely hard to do! I do not recommend this app!!

attributes.title: i can’t believe this 😔
attributes.review: this app literally gave me covid-19. 😔😔i was so confused because i followed the president’s guidance and wore no mask but????😔😔😔 as soon as i downloaded this app🙃(WHICH TOOK A WHOLE DAY) 🙃🙃🙃🙃 i started coughing and feeling feverish😔😔✌️ and when i went to the hospital they tested me and 😳😳😳 i have covid-19 now.😤

attributes.title: Horrible disgusting and horrible
attributes.review: I hate this app with all my life I’m not even kidding delete this app right now because it’s the worst thing to ever exist. Horrible app that deserves to be taken down immediately not even joking. I hate this app it’s 🤮🤮🤢🤢🤮

attributes.title: Why is it #1
attributes.review: It’s #1 in news but Twitter is #2 with almost 5 stars. Also how can it be news when it is biased to the conservatives. I also don’t understand how to work this app. Error messages constantly show up
